/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a bustling street scene in Beijing, China. The perspective is from a pedestrian's viewpoint on the sidewalk, immersing the viewer in the city's daily life. The street is lined with modern buildings, their facades adorned with vibrant advertisements that add a splash of color to the urban landscape. Cars and buses traverse the road, indicating a busy time of day. The sky above is hazy, casting a soft light over the scene. In the background, trees and lampposts can be seen, adding a touch of nature to the concrete jungle.
